title: ‘The Craziest Turnover’: From Olympic Track Silver to Tour de France Femmes Contention in 24 Hours
content:
After nailing whirlwind logistics, omnium silver medalist Daria Pikulik and Canada's Maggie Coles-Lyster feel track racing is good prep for an early stage win: ‘Anything can happen this week’

Read the full article at ‘The Craziest Turnover’: From Olympic Track Silver to Tour de France Femmes Contention in 24 Hours on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
